text: DI NE TEN VI responsible POR mere utterance oaths; LI TEN VI responsible POR your REAL intentions Vi violate oath vi atone feeding 10 poor popol el sam food vi ofert your own famili aux vest them liber sklav! Vi ne afford this tiam vi fast 3 tag. This est atonement violating oaths vi jxur keep Vi fulfill your oaths. DI TIEL EKSPLIK His revelations VI VI est appreciative
